answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Richard – I hope this is helpful re: selling city owned property agreement:
Selling City Owned Property Efficiently:  Exclusive Right to Sell Brokerage Agreement
http://www.gbbr.org/pdf/SCOPE-FINALListingAgreement.pdf
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director 
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Richard Wilkie
text:
I am currently looking at utilizing commercial brokerage services to help market and sell city owned property, and was wondering if anyone might have such an agreement that they would be willing to share.
Thank you.
Richard
title: Commercial Brokerage Services City Property
